cookies.accept-description: Accept the use of a web storage and proceed to the app.
cookies.cancel-description: Reject usage of a web storage and exit the app.
cookies.info-label: Opens a dialog with the ARSnova data protection policy.
cookies.title: Data Privacy

data-protection.a11y: Below you will find the privacy policy of ARSnova.
data-protection.title: Data Privacy

header.a11y-back: Go back to the previous page.
header.a11y-session: Open the user menu. Here you can view the sessions you have attended or log out of your account.
header.a11y-qr-code: Opens a dialog box that displays the session link as QR code.
header.session-id-copied: Session link was copied to the clipboard.

home-page.a11y-join-button: Enter the session with the specified session key.
home-page.a11y-join-input: Here you can enter the  key of the session you want to join. Your lecturer will tell you the session key.
home-page.a11y-welcome-message: Welcome to ARSnova. Enter an eight-digit session code to join a session or press the escape key to get information about key combinations.
home-page.a11y-home-keys: You are on the homepage of ARSnova. Press key 1 to enter a session code, key 2 to enter the user login or the session menu, key 3 to create a new session, key 4 to select the language, or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
home-page.a11y-user-message: You are now on the user page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
home-page.a11y-user-keys: Press key 1 to create a new session, key 2 to go to the user menu, key 3 to join a session, key 4 to get your visited and created sessions, key 0 to go back to the home page, or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
home-page.a11y-session-join: Now enter the session code of the session you want to join.
home-page.exactly-8: A session key has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this key
home-page.only-numbers: A session key only contains digits.
home-page.please-enter: Ask the lecturer for the key

imprint.a11y: Below you will find the legal info of ARSnova.
imprint.title: Imprint

introduction.a11y: Below you will find an introduction to ARSnova.
introduction.title: »ARSnova«

login.a11y-sso-login: You will be forwarded to {{provider}} to log in.
login.email-description: Enter your e-mail address with which you want to login with your arsnova account here.
login.login-description: Log in with the entered account data
login.login-tooltip: Sessions will be stored for 180 days.
login.password-description: Enter your password with which you want to login with your arsnova account here.

overlay.cancel-description: Opens the web storage setting dialog
overlay.message: You have rejected the use of a web storage. Without it the app will not work.
overlay.title: Use not possible

password-reset.a11y-new-password2: Enter your new password here again
password-reset.a11y-reset-button: Sends a password reset key to the entered e-mail, with which a new password can be set.
password-reset.a11y-reset-key: Enter the password reset key you received by email here
password-reset.a11y-enter-email: Enter your email address here to set a new password
password-reset.email-description: Enter your email address here to reset your password.
password-reset.new-password-successful: The new password has been set.
password-reset.reset-button-description: Resets the password of the account
password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.
password-reset.set-button-description: Set the new password for the account
password-reset.set-new-password: Set a new password with the key code that was sent to you:

register.email-description-repeat: Please enter your e-mail address again to ensure that you have not mistyped.
register.password-description: Enter the password you want to register with here.
register.password-description-repeat: Please enter the password you want to register with again to make sure that you have not mistyped it.
register.register-request-error: Something went wrong with the registration. Maybe you already made the account?
register.register-successful: Successfully registered. Please check your mails.

room-list.a11y-join-session: Enter the session {{session}} with the code {{id}} in the role {{role}}
room-list.a11y-session-history: Your session history contains {{count}} sessions. Navigate through your sessions with Tab.
room-list.a11y-more-options: Show more options for this session
room-list.filter: Here you can filter the list of sessions.
room-list.no-room-history: You haven't joined any sessions yet.
room-list.room-successfully-removed: The session was successfully removed from the history.

user-activation.activation-key-input-description: Enter the activation key that you received by e-mail.

dialog.a11y-cancel: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-delete: Confirms the action and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-update: Save the changes and close the dialog.
dialog.a11y-send: Sends your comment and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-tag: Select a category here if you want to categorize your comment.
dialog.a11y-comment-presentation: The comment {{comment}} is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the comment board.
dialog.a11y-edit-subject: Edit the subject of the question here.
dialog.a11y-edit-body: Edit the body of the question here.
dialog.a11y-edit-checkbox: Set here whether the answer is right or wrong.
dialog.a11y-room-name-input: Enter the name of the session you want to create here and confirm your entry with the Enter key.
dialog.really-delete-comment: Do you really want to delete this comment?
dialog.really-delete-comments: Do you really want to delete all comments of this session? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-comments-hint: There are comments in this session that you marked for a bonus. Remove the markers to delete all comments.
dialog.really-delete-answer: Do you really want to delete this answer?
dialog.really-delete-content: Do you really want to delete the following content? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-moderator: Do you really want to remove the following moderator?
dialog.really-delete-session: Do you really want to delete the following session? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-remove-session-from-history: Do you really want to remove the following session from your history?
dialog.really-delete-token: Do you really want to delete this token?
dialog.really-delete-tokens: Do you really want to delete all tokens of this session?
dialog.really-delete-account: Do you want to irrevocably delete your account with all sessions?
dialog.really-reset-form: Do you really want to reset all inputs?
dialog.create-comment-description: Enter your comment to the audience here!
dialog.select-one-answer: In single choice mode you have to select 1 true answer.
dialog.at-least-one: In multiple choice mode you have to select at least 1 true answer.
dialog.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check subject and body.
dialog.content-group-name-input: Enter the name of the collection you want to create here.
dialog.content-group-created: Question was added to new collection.
dialog.a11y-copy-url: Copy link to session to the clipboard
dialog.user-got-tokens: You have bonus tokens linked to this account that will be lost!
